definition: to float down/to fall gently (snowflakes, leaves etc)
variant of 飄|飘[piao1]
to float
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: Slowly, it drifted down on the coldly wet ground in the street, like a butterfly at night.
sentences.chinese: 缓缓地，飘落在湿冷的街面上，好像一只夜晚的蝴蝶。

sentences.english: In folds of golden fulness within my door?
sentences.chinese: 你甘让你那音乐飘落在我门前。

sentences.english: The sky became dark down, falling under the west rain silk.
sentences.chinese: 南国的天空变得阴晦沉沦，飘落下丝丝西雨。

sentences.english: The leaves, still green, tossed off the hedgerow trees by the wind.
sentences.chinese: 仍然是绿色的叶子吹得从灌木篱笆上飘落下来。

sentences.english: The birds exploded into the air, all pipes and feathers.
sentences.chinese: 鸟群猛冲上天，鸣叫响成一片，羽毛纷纷飘落。

sentences.english: A fallen leaf Mourns its wings that can not fly.
sentences.chinese: 飘落的叶子遗憾自己不会飞翔的翅膀。

sentences.english: Without my blessing, not a leaf will fall.
sentences.chinese: 没有叶子会违背我的旨意飘落。

sentences.english: But I should do something for you. Look at this, ” and he held up an early autumn leaf that had fluttered onto the porch.
sentences.chinese: 你看，”他捡起了一片飘落在门廊上的早秋落叶。

sentences.english: Some leaves fluttered to the ground.
The fading blooms, fall with once yellow bright.
Like gossamer you float and land on pavilions.
sentences.chinese: 你像蛛丝一样飘落在亭阁上。

sentences.english: And yellow leaves from the maple that lined our street.
sentences.chinese: 是我们的街道上成行种着的枫树飘落下黄色的叶子。

sentences.english: The autumn leaves were floating in measure down to the ground, recovering the lake.
sentences.chinese: 秋叶翻飞，飘落一地，层层落叶盖满了小湖。

sentences.english: The cheque fluttered to the floor like a bird with a broken wing.
sentences.chinese: 支票像只断了翅膀的小鸟似的飘落在地板上。

sentences.english: Winter is coming, and withered and yellow leaves falling down one after another.
sentences.chinese: 冬天快要到了，枯黄的树叶纷纷飘落下来。

definition: fluttering about (of leaves etc)
snowflake
suave/graceful/fluent and elegant (calligraphy)
(of snow etc) to fill the sky
to flutter/to dance in the breeze
to fly up/to dance in the air (of snowflakes, flower petals etc)
to swirl in the air (of thickly falling snowflakes, flower petals etc)/to flutter about
lit. to fill the whole sky/everywhere/as far as the eye can see
dead leaf/withered leaf
very slight sound/rustling (onom.)/to stream down (of tears)/luxuriant growth (of vegetation)
to fall and wither (like autumn leaves)/(fig.) drifting and homeless
dead leaves/to lose leaves (of plants)/deciduous
to waft (through the air)/to drift
wind-borne/tossed about by the wind
tree leaves
raindrop
